problem_names: lemma domrangefix: "d x = x \<longleftrightarrow> r x = x"

lemma box_diamond_galois_1:
assumes "d p = p" and "d q = q"
shows "\<langle>x| p \<le> q \<longleftrightarrow> p \<le> |x] q"

lemma box_diamond_galois_2:
assumes "d p = p" and "d q = q"
shows "|x\<rangle> p \<le> q \<longleftrightarrow> p \<le> [x| q"

lemma diamond_conjugation_var_1:
assumes "d p = p" and "d q = q"
shows "|x\<rangle> p \<le> ad q \<longleftrightarrow> \<langle>x| q \<le> ad p"

lemma diamond_conjungation_aux:
assumes "d p = p" and "d q = q"
shows "\<langle>x| p \<le> ad q \<longleftrightarrow> q \<cdot> \<langle>x| p = 0"

lemma diamond_conjugation:
assumes "d p = p" and "d q = q"
shows "p \<cdot> |x\<rangle> q = 0 \<longleftrightarrow> q \<cdot> \<langle>x| p = 0"

lemma box_conjugation_var_1:
assumes "d p = p" and "d q = q"
shows "ad p \<le> [x| q \<longleftrightarrow> ad q \<le> |x] p"
lemma box_diamond_cancellation_1: "d p = p \<Longrightarrow> p \<le> |x] \<langle>x| p"
lemma box_diamond_cancellation_2: "d p = p \<Longrightarrow> p \<le> [x| |x\<rangle> p"
lemma box_diamond_cancellation_3: "d p = p \<Longrightarrow> |x\<rangle> [x| p \<le> p"
lemma box_diamond_cancellation_4: "d p = p \<Longrightarrow> \<langle>x| |x] p \<le> p"
translations: lemma domrangefix: "d x = x \<longleftrightarrow> r x = x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (d x = x) = (r x = x)
by (metis domrange rangedom)

lemma box_diamond_galois_1:
assumes "d p = p" and "d q = q"
shows "\<langle>x| p \<le> q \<longleftrightarrow> p \<le> |x] q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<langle>x| p \<le> q) = (p \<le>  |x] q)
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<langle>x| p \<le> q) = (p \<le>  |x] q)
have "\<langle>x| p \<le> q \<longleftrightarrow> p \<cdot> x \<le> x \<cdot> q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<langle>x| p \<le> q) = (p \<cdot> x \<le> x \<cdot> q)
by (metis assms domrangefix local.ardual.ds.fdemodalisation2 local.ars_r_def)

proof (state)
this:
  (\<langle>x| p \<le> q) = (p \<cdot> x \<le> x \<cdot> q)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<langle>x| p \<le> q) = (p \<le>  |x] q)
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  (\<langle>x| p \<le> q) = (p \<cdot> x \<le> x \<cdot> q)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<langle>x| p \<le> q) = (p \<le>  |x] q)
by (metis assms fbox_demodalisation3)

proof (state)
this:
  (\<langle>x| p \<le> q) = (p \<le>  |x] q)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma box_diamond_galois_2:
assumes "d p = p" and "d q = q"
shows "|x\<rangle> p \<le> q \<longleftrightarrow> p \<le> [x| q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ( |x\<rangle> p \<le> q) = (p \<le> [x| q)
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ( |x\<rangle> p \<le> q) = (p \<le> [x| q)
have "|x\<rangle> p \<le> q \<longleftrightarrow> x \<cdot> p \<le> q \<cdot> x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ( |x\<rangle> p \<le> q) = (x \<cdot> p \<le> q \<cdot> x)
by (metis assms local.ads_d_def local.ds.fdemodalisation2)

proof (state)
this:
  ( |x\<rangle> p \<le> q) = (x \<cdot> p \<le> q \<cdot> x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ( |x\<rangle> p \<le> q) = (p \<le> [x| q)
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  ( |x\<rangle> p \<le> q) = (x \<cdot> p \<le> q \<cdot> x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ( |x\<rangle> p \<le> q) = (p \<le> [x| q)
by (metis assms domrangefix local.ardual.fbox_demodalisation3)

proof (state)
this:
  ( |x\<rangle> p \<le> q) = (p \<le> [x| q)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma diamond_conjugation_var_1:
assumes "d p = p" and "d q = q"
shows "|x\<rangle> p \<le> ad q \<longleftrightarrow> \<langle>x| q \<le> ad p"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ( |x\<rangle> p \<le> ad q) = (\<langle>x| q \<le> ad p)
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ( |x\<rangle> p \<le> ad q) = (\<langle>x| q \<le> ad p)
have "|x\<rangle> p \<le> ad q \<longleftrightarrow> x \<cdot> p \<le> ad q \<cdot> x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ( |x\<rangle> p \<le> ad q) = (x \<cdot> p \<le> ad q \<cdot> x)
by (metis assms local.ads_d_def local.ds.fdemodalisation2)

proof (state)
this:
  ( |x\<rangle> p \<le> ad q) = (x \<cdot> p \<le> ad q \<cdot> x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ( |x\<rangle> p \<le> ad q) = (\<langle>x| q \<le> ad p)
also

proof (state)
this:
  ( |x\<rangle> p \<le> ad q) = (x \<cdot> p \<le> ad q \<cdot> x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ( |x\<rangle> p \<le> ad q) = (\<langle>x| q \<le> ad p)
have "... \<longleftrightarrow> q \<cdot> x \<le> x \<cdot> ad p"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x \<cdot> p \<le> ad q \<cdot> x) = (q \<cdot> x \<le> x \<cdot> ad p)
by (metis assms local.ads_d_def local.kat_1_equiv_opp)

proof (state)
this:
  (x \<cdot> p \<le> ad q \<cdot> x) = (q \<cdot> x \<le> x \<cdot> ad p)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ( |x\<rangle> p \<le> ad q) = (\<langle>x| q \<le> ad p)
finally

proof (chain)
picking this:
  ( |x\<rangle> p \<le> ad q) = (q \<cdot> x \<le> x \<cdot> ad p)
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  ( |x\<rangle> p \<le> ad q) = (q \<cdot> x \<le> x \<cdot> ad p)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ( |x\<rangle> p \<le> ad q) = (\<langle>x| q \<le> ad p)
by (metis assms box_diamond_galois_1 local.ads_d_def local.fbox_demodalisation3)

proof (state)
this:
  ( |x\<rangle> p \<le> ad q) = (\<langle>x| q \<le> ad p)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma diamond_conjungation_aux:
assumes "d p = p" and "d q = q"
shows "\<langle>x| p \<le> ad q \<longleftrightarrow> q \<cdot> \<langle>x| p = 0"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<langle>x| p \<le> ad q) =
    (q \<cdot> \<langle>x| p = (zero_class.zero::'a))
apply standard

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<langle>x| p \<le> ad q \<Longrightarrow>
    q \<cdot> \<langle>x| p = (zero_class.zero::'a)
 2. q \<cdot> \<langle>x| p = (zero_class.zero::'a) \<Longrightarrow>
    \<langle>x| p \<le> ad q
apply (metis assms(2) local.a_antitone' local.a_gla local.ads_d_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. q \<cdot> \<langle>x| p = (zero_class.zero::'a) \<Longrightarrow>
    \<langle>x| p \<le> ad q
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. q \<cdot> \<langle>x| p = (zero_class.zero::'a) \<Longrightarrow>
    \<langle>x| p \<le> ad q
assume a1: "q \<cdot> \<langle>x| p = zero_class.zero"

proof (state)
this:
  q \<cdot> \<langle>x| p = (zero_class.zero::'a)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. q \<cdot> \<langle>x| p = (zero_class.zero::'a) \<Longrightarrow>
    \<langle>x| p \<le> ad q
have "ad (ad q) = q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ad (ad q) = q
using assms(2) local.ads_d_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  d q = q
  d ?x = ad (ad ?x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ad (ad q) = q
by fastforce

proof (state)
this:
  ad (ad q) = q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. q \<cdot> \<langle>x| p = (zero_class.zero::'a) \<Longrightarrow>
    \<langle>x| p \<le> ad q
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  ad (ad q) = q
show "\<langle>x| p \<le> ad q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  ad (ad q) = q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<langle>x| p \<le> ad q
using a1

proof (prove)
using this:
  ad (ad q) = q
  q \<cdot> \<langle>x| p = (zero_class.zero::'a)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<langle>x| p \<le> ad q
by (metis (no_types) domrangefix local.a_gla local.ads_d_def local.antisym local.ardual.a_gla2 local.ardual.gla_1 local.ars_r_def local.bdia_def local.eq_refl)

proof (state)
this:
  \<langle>x| p \<le> ad q

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma diamond_conjugation:
assumes "d p = p" and "d q = q"
shows "p \<cdot> |x\<rangle> q = 0 \<longleftrightarrow> q \<cdot> \<langle>x| p = 0"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (p \<cdot>  |x\<rangle> q = (zero_class.zero::'a)) =
    (q \<cdot> \<langle>x| p = (zero_class.zero::'a))
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (p \<cdot>  |x\<rangle> q = (zero_class.zero::'a)) =
    (q \<cdot> \<langle>x| p = (zero_class.zero::'a))
have "p \<cdot> |x\<rangle> q = 0 \<longleftrightarrow> |x\<rangle> q \<le> ad p"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (p \<cdot>  |x\<rangle> q = (zero_class.zero::'a)) =
    ( |x\<rangle> q \<le> ad p)
by (metis assms(1) local.a_gla local.ads_d_def local.am2 local.fdia_def)

proof (state)
this:
  (p \<cdot>  |x\<rangle> q = (zero_class.zero::'a)) =
  ( |x\<rangle> q \<le> ad p)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (p \<cdot>  |x\<rangle> q = (zero_class.zero::'a)) =
    (q \<cdot> \<langle>x| p = (zero_class.zero::'a))
also

proof (state)
this:
  (p \<cdot>  |x\<rangle> q = (zero_class.zero::'a)) =
  ( |x\<rangle> q \<le> ad p)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (p \<cdot>  |x\<rangle> q = (zero_class.zero::'a)) =
    (q \<cdot> \<langle>x| p = (zero_class.zero::'a))
have "... \<longleftrightarrow> \<langle>x| p \<le> ad q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ( |x\<rangle> q \<le> ad p) = (\<langle>x| p \<le> ad q)
by (simp add: assms diamond_conjugation_var_1)

proof (state)
this:
  ( |x\<rangle> q \<le> ad p) = (\<langle>x| p \<le> ad q)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (p \<cdot>  |x\<rangle> q = (zero_class.zero::'a)) =
    (q \<cdot> \<langle>x| p = (zero_class.zero::'a))
finally

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (p \<cdot>  |x\<rangle> q = (zero_class.zero::'a)) =
  (\<langle>x| p \<le> ad q)
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  (p \<cdot>  |x\<rangle> q = (zero_class.zero::'a)) =
  (\<langle>x| p \<le> ad q)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (p \<cdot>  |x\<rangle> q = (zero_class.zero::'a)) =
    (q \<cdot> \<langle>x| p = (zero_class.zero::'a))
by (simp add: assms diamond_conjungation_aux)

proof (state)
this:
  (p \<cdot>  |x\<rangle> q = (zero_class.zero::'a)) =
  (q \<cdot> \<langle>x| p = (zero_class.zero::'a))

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma box_conjugation_var_1:
assumes "d p = p" and "d q = q"
shows "ad p \<le> [x| q \<longleftrightarrow> ad q \<le> |x] p"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (ad p \<le> [x| q) = (ad q \<le>  |x] p)
by (metis assms box_diamond_galois_1 box_diamond_galois_2 diamond_conjugation_var_1 local.ads_d_def)
lemma box_diamond_cancellation_1: "d p = p \<Longrightarrow> p \<le> |x] \<langle>x| p"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. d p = p \<Longrightarrow> p \<le>  |x] \<langle>x| p
using box_diamond_galois_1 domrangefix local.ars_r_def local.bdia_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>d ?p = ?p; d ?q = ?q\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (\<langle>?x| ?p \<le> ?q) = (?p \<le>  |?x] ?q)
  (d ?x = ?x) = (r ?x = ?x)
  r ?x = ar ar ?x
  \<langle>?x| ?y = ar ar (?y \<cdot> ?x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. d p = p \<Longrightarrow> p \<le>  |x] \<langle>x| p
by fastforce
lemma box_diamond_cancellation_2: "d p = p \<Longrightarrow> p \<le> [x| |x\<rangle> p"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. d p = p \<Longrightarrow> p \<le> [x|  |x\<rangle> p
by (metis box_diamond_galois_2 local.ads_d_def local.dpdz.domain_invol local.eq_refl local.fdia_def)
lemma box_diamond_cancellation_3: "d p = p \<Longrightarrow> |x\<rangle> [x| p \<le> p"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. d p = p \<Longrightarrow>  |x\<rangle> [x| p \<le> p
using box_diamond_galois_2 domrangefix local.ardual.fdia_fbox_de_morgan_2 local.ars_r_def local.bbox_def local.bdia_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>d ?p = ?p; d ?q = ?q\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ( |?x\<rangle> ?p \<le> ?q) = (?p \<le> [?x| ?q)
  (d ?x = ?x) = (r ?x = ?x)
  ar (\<langle>?x| ?y) = [?x| ar ?y
  r ?x = ar ar ?x
  [?x| ?y = ar (ar ?y \<cdot> ?x)
  \<langle>?x| ?y = ar ar (?y \<cdot> ?x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. d p = p \<Longrightarrow>  |x\<rangle> [x| p \<le> p
by auto
lemma box_diamond_cancellation_4: "d p = p \<Longrightarrow> \<langle>x| |x] p \<le> p"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. d p = p \<Longrightarrow> \<langle>x|  |x] p \<le> p
using box_diamond_galois_1 local.ads_d_def local.fbox_def local.fdia_def local.fdia_fbox_de_morgan_2

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>d ?p = ?p; d ?q = ?q\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (\<langle>?x| ?p \<le> ?q) = (?p \<le>  |?x] ?q)
  d ?x = ad (ad ?x)
   |?x] ?y = ad (?x \<cdot> ad ?y)
   |?x\<rangle> ?y = ad (ad (?x \<cdot> ?y))
  ad ( |?x\<rangle> ?y) =  |?x] ad ?y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. d p = p \<Longrightarrow> \<langle>x|  |x] p \<le> p
by auto
end

class modal_kleene_algebra = modal_semiring + kleene_algebra
begin
subclass antidomain_kleene_algebra

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. class.antidomain_kleene_algebra ad (+) (\<cdot>) (1::'a)
     (zero_class.zero::'a) (\<le>) (<) star
subclass antirange_kleene_algebra

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. class.antirange_kleene_algebra (+) (\<cdot>) (1::'a)
     (zero_class.zero::'a) (\<le>) (<) star antirange_op
end
end
